original_text: On the morning of the third day there were thunders and lightnings and a thick cloud on the mountain and a very loud trumpet blast, so that all the people in the camp trembled.
korean_text: 셋째 날 아침에 우레와 번개와 빽빽한 구름이 산 위에 있고 나팔 소리가 매우 크게 들리니 진중에 있는 모든 백성이 다 떨더라

sentences.original_text: On the morning of the third day
and a thick cloud on the mountain
and a very loud trumpet blast
so that all the people in the camp trembled
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 진에 있는 모든 백성이 떨었습니다
